content.question: Line 6, (Coniugis . . . amore) is translated

choices.label: Or am I to comfort myself with the faithful love of a husband
Or does my comforter remember his wife with a faithful love
Or do I trust in the love of a husband to be my comfort
Or am I to be comforted by the memory of my faithful husbandâ€™s love

content.answer: Or am I to comfort myself with the faithful love of a husband

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
